title: Lick the Razor
description: Lick the Razor is a foray into the world of dark fiction, or "splatterpunk", in a collection of 15 short stories by US writer DB Tarpley.A miscellany of the macabre, Lick the Razor conjures up a mood of insidious disquiet, foreboding and inevitability. Not only is it creepy, haunting and smart, it also digs deep into the twisted state of the human mind.A classic of its kind.
author: D.B. Tarpley
